short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you add sites straight to 1Feed, your quiet place on the internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you add sites straight to 1Feed, your quiet place on the internet. You can click on the 1Feed extension icon from any website, and it will let you add the site to 1Feed.
